name: Shark Bounce
description:
Attack from the deep sea!

Control your shark for a big hunt!
Tourists by the sea, troops to support, armed helicopters in the sky, will become your delicious meal!

[A variety of sharks, different experiences]
Choose any type of shark you like to swim and hunt in the sea

[Character armed, strengthen your shark]
Equipped with a variety of machine guns, artillery, help you show your skills

[Eat the tourists, defeat the Army]
Left hand control forward direction, can jump out of the water to attack tourists
The right hand controls the direction of the machine gun, which can also destroy the enemy on the shore in the water
